## Description {#details}

Whether the SU shares a V&#95;PERM predecessor with any SU in the <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuigrouplp-cpp-/schedgroup">SchedGroup</a> that is <code>Distance</code> steps away.
